CertificateFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a certificate file on disk. Use 'Steeltoe.Common.Certificates.CertificateSettings.PrivateKeyFilePath' if the private key is stored in another file.

PrivateKeyFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a private key file on disk (optional).

ConfigServer.description: Configuration settings for certificate access. Indicates where to load a 'System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2' from.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of this application.

Application.description: Fallback configuration settings that describe this application.

AccessTokenUri.description: Gets or sets the address used by the provider to obtain a OAuth Access Token.

ClientId.description: Gets or sets the client ID used by the provider to obtain a OAuth Access Token.

ClientSecret.description: Gets or sets the client secret used by the provider to obtain a OAuth Access Token.

DisableTokenRenewal.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether periodic HashiCorp Vault token renewal should occur. Default value: false.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discovery-first feature is enabled. Default value: false.

ServiceId.description: Gets or sets the Service ID of the Config Server to use during discovery-first. Default value: "configserver".

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Config Server provider is enabled. Default value: true.

Env.description: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of environments used when accessing configuration data. Default value: "Production".

FailFast.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether fail-fast behavior is enabled. Default value: false.

Headers.description: Gets headers that will be added to the Config Server request.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether health checks are enabled. Default value: true.

TimeToLive.description: Gets or sets the health check cache time-to-live (in milliseconds). Default value: 300_000 (5 minutes).

Label.description: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of labels to request from the server.

Name.description: Gets or sets the application name used when accessing configuration data.

Password.description: Gets or sets the password used when accessing the Config Server.

PollingInterval.description: Gets or sets the frequency with which app should check Config Server for changes in configuration.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether retries are enabled on failures. Default value: false.

InitialInterval.description: Gets or sets initial retry interval (in milliseconds). Default value: 1000.

MaxAttempts.description: Gets or sets the max number of retries the client will attempt. Default value: 6.

MaxInterval.description: Gets or sets max retry interval (in milliseconds). Default value: 2000.

Multiplier.description: Gets or sets the multiplier for next retry interval. Default value: 1.1.

Timeout.description: Gets or sets the request timeout (in milliseconds). Default value: 60_000 (1 minute).

Token.description: Gets or sets the HashiCorp Vault authentication token.

TokenRenewRate.description: Gets or sets the vault token renew rate (in milliseconds). Default value: 60_000 (1 minute).

TokenTtl.description: Gets or sets the HashiCorp Vault token time-to-live (in milliseconds). Default value: 300_000 (5 minutes).

Uri.description: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of Config Server addresses. Default value: "http://localhost:8888".

Username.description: Gets or sets the username used when accessing the Config Server.

ValidateCertificates.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the provider validates server certificates. Default value: true.

Config.description: Holds settings used to configure the Spring Cloud Config Server provider.
